titleStmt.title: The replication to the City of London's plea to the quo warranto brought against their charter by our Sovereign Lord the King in Michaelmas term, 1681
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
Sawyer, Robert, Sir, 1633-1692.
England and Wales. Attorney-General.
London (England). City of London's plea to the quo warranto (an information) brought against their charter in Michaelmas term, 1681.

notesStmt.note: Reply brief, by Attorney-General Robert Sawyer, to the plea published in 1682 under title: The City of London's plea to the quo warranto (an information) brought against their charter in Michaelmas term, 1681.
Incorrectly identified on film as Wing R1074, which is located at reel position 2236:43.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
